pullRequest.title: [JBPM-8936] ConcurrentModificationException when retrieving server template
pullRequest.bodyText: different instances of the server template through the storage.

nodes.bodyText: Please change the line 38 to also use EnumMap<> for consistency.
I guess we no longer need store to be of ConcurrentHashMap implementation if we are fully locking it.

nodes.bodyText:
Here we store the EnumMap instance but in the original state of an object there is an instance of HashMap created. 
  
    
      droolsjbpm-integration/kie-server-parent/kie-server-controller/kie-server-controller-api/src/main/java/org/kie/server/controller/api/model/spec/ServerTemplate.java
    
    
         Line 40
      in
      1b42ad1
    
    
    
    

        
          
           private Map<Capability, ServerConfig> configs = new HashMap<Capability, ServerConfig>();

Here we use EnumMap but the initializer is set to HashMap, see:

  
    
      droolsjbpm-integration/kie-server-parent/kie-server-controller/kie-server-controller-api/src/main/java/org/kie/server/controller/api/model/spec/ContainerSpec.java
    
    
         Line 36
      in
      1b42ad1
    
    
    
    

        
          
           private Map<Capability, ContainerConfig> configs = new HashMap<>();
